dev.text: Build production-quality features with tests. Follow the architecture patterns defined by the architect.

architect.text: Design the full system architecture: frontend, backend, infrastructure. Document decisions in ADRs.

devops.text: Manage CI/CD, infrastructure as code, monitoring, alerting, and deployment strategies.

history.text: Comprehensive testing strategy: unit, integration, e2e. Track quality metrics and regressions.

data-engineer.text: Design and maintain data layer: schemas, migrations, analytics pipelines, caching strategies.

analyst.text: Market research, competitor analysis, user research synthesis. Feed insights to PM and PO.

pm.text: Define product roadmap, prioritize features, write user stories with clear acceptance criteria.

po.text: Validate deliverables against business requirements. Approve or reject with clear feedback.

sm.text: Facilitate sprint ceremonies, remove blockers, track velocity and team health metrics.

ux-design-expert.text: Design user flows, wireframes, and UI specifications. Ensure consistency and accessibility.

aios-master.text: Coordinate multi-agent workflows, optimize agent interactions, resolve conflicts.

squad-creator.text: Dynamically assemble and disband agent squads based on task requirements.
